TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent extends System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent

summary.span: 提供有关成功身份验证事件的信息。

span.span: Provides information about successful authentication events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视，用于管理已部署的 Web 应用程序的生产和操作人员。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含负责打包应用程序运行状况状态数据和负责处理此数据提供程序类型的运行状况事件类型。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含在管理运行状况事件期间帮助的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 以下列表介绍用于 ASP.NET 将引发类型的事件的功能。The following list describes the features for which ASP.NET raises events of type . > [!NOTE] > 默认情况下配置 ASP.NET 以记录审核失败条件唯一，因为记录成功条件会严重损害系统资源。By default ASP.NET is configured to log audit failure conditions only, as logging success conditions can severely strain system resources. 你始终可以配置系统记录成功的情况。You can always configure the system to log the success conditions. - 窗体身份验证。Forms Authentication. 审核成功的条件。Successful conditions are audited. 成功审核包括经过身份验证的用户名称。Success audits include the user name that was authenticated. 相反，失败审核不包括用户名称，因为它们通常来自解密或验证失败的票证。Instead, failure audits do not include the user name, since they typically result from a ticket that failed decryption or validation. 同时包含客户端的 IP 地址。Both contain the client IP address. 相关的事件审核代码是。The related event audit code is . - 成员身份。Membership. 审核成功的条件。Successful conditions are audited. 成功和失败审核包含试图的用户名。Both success and failure audits contain the username that was attempted. 审核任何一种形式将包含已尝试的密码，因为，将保留在日志中有效的密码的危险。Neither form of audit will contain the password that was attempted, because that would risk persisting a valid password in the log. 相关的事件审核代码是。The related event audit code is . 当引发时，默认情况下它会更新身份验证成功事件引发的性能计数器。When a is raised, by default it updates the Authentication Success Events Raised performance counter. 若要查看在系统监视器 (PerfMon)，此性能计数器中**添加计数器**窗口中选择**ASP.NET**中**性能对象**下拉列表中，选择身份验证成功事件引发的性能计数器，然后单击**添加**按钮。To view this performance counter in System Monitor (PerfMon), in the **Add Counters** window select **ASP.NET** in the **Performance object** drop-down list, select the Authentication Success Events Raised performance counter, and click the **Add** button. 有关详细信息，请参阅[与 ASP.NET 应用程序中使用系统监视器 (PerfMon)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=36882&clcid=0x409) MSDN 上。For more information, see [Using the System Monitor (PerfMon) with ASP.NET Applications](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=36882&clcid=0x409) on MSDN. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下，你将是一种能够使用 ASP.NET 运行状况监视类型，因为实现，并且将通过指定中的值控制运行状况监视系统`healthMonitoring`配置节。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 你还可以从要创建你自己的自定义事件和提供程序的运行状况监视类型派生。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 有关示例的派生自类，请参阅本主题中提供的示例。For an example of deriving from the class, see the example provided in this topic. ## Examples 此代码示例由两部分组成： 配置文件摘录中，演示如何自定义代码，后跟事件。This code example has two parts: a configuration-file excerpt, followed by code that shows how to customize the event. 下面是配置文件的摘录`provider`和`eventMappings`部分。This following is an excerpt of the configuration file's `provider` and `eventMappings` sections. 默认情况下，它们是已设置。They are already set by default. 你需要执行操作的唯一操作是提供的安装程序`rules`中的元素`healthMonitoring`部分。The only thing you need to do is to provide the setup for the `rules` element in the `healthMonitoring` section. ``` // Configure the provider to process // the health events. // Configure the custom event // to handle the audit events. // Establish the connection between custom event // and the provider that must process it. \ ``` 下面的代码演示如何自定义事件。The following code shows how to customize the event. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent/CS/WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent/VB/WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视系统在内部使用此构造函数。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 你不应使用它来实例化对象，但你在实现您自己的从此类继承的事件类型时，可以调用此构造函数。You will never use it to instantiate a object, but you can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class. > [!NOTE] > 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它由 ASP.NET 进行调用。It is called by ASP.NET. 你可以调用构造函数从派生时类。You can call the constructor when deriving from the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何自定义此构造函数。The following code example shows how to customize this constructor. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent/CS/WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent/VB/WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视系统在内部使用此构造函数。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 你不应使用它来实例化对象，但你在实现您自己的从此类继承的事件类型时，可以调用此构造函数。You will never use it to instantiate a object, but you can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class. > [!NOTE] > 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它由 ASP.NET 进行调用。It is called by ASP.NET. 你可以调用构造函数从派生时类。You can call the constructor when deriving from the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何自定义此构造函数。The following code example shows how to customize this constructor. remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有成功审核包括已经过身份验证的用户的名称。Only the success audits include the name of the authenticated user. 失败审核不包括用户名称，因为它们通常来源于失败的解密或验证。The failure audits do not include the user name, since they typically result from failed decryption or validation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent/CS/WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent/VB/WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent.vb#3)]
